summary: Tarzan goes to New York to rescue the chimp Cheetah, who has been captured by an evil animal experimenter. There, he teams up with Jane, a cab driver and daughter of an ex-cop private eye, who help Tarzan free Cheetah and his friends.
cast: Joe Lara|Kim Crosby|James Medina|Jan-Michael Vincent|Joe Seneca|Tony Curtis|Peter Sherayko|Robert Benedetti|Jim Doughan|Oliver Muirhead|Darnell Gregorio-De Palma|Joel Carlson|Jerry Queeney|Sloan Fischer|Terry Millines|Rodney Saulsberry|Don McLeod|Buck Young|Christopher Carroll
